meanings.sent1: During midwinter, the days are shorter and the nights are longer.
meanings.sent2: We always celebrate Christmas in midwinter when it's cold outside.
meanings.sent3: At the midwinter party, we all wore cozy sweaters and drank hot cocoa.
meanings.sent4: In the heart of midwinter, the snow-covered landscape looked magical.
meanings.sent5: The animals in the forest hibernate during midwinter to stay warm.

meanings.definition: The period of winter around the middle of the season.
meanings.sent1: In our region, midwinter usually brings heavy snowfall and icy roads.
meanings.sent2: During midwinter, many people plan vacations to escape the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The midwinter break from school is a great time to relax and recharge.
meanings.sent4: As we reached midwinter, the temperature dropped even further.
meanings.sent5: The midwinter frost coated the trees in a shimmering layer of ice.
